concept.title: Draw paths using the Pencil tool
concept.shortdesc: The Pencil tool lets you draw paths, replicating using a pencil drawing on paper. The tool is most useful for creating hand-drawn looking shapes.

conbody.section:
To use the Pencil tool:
Select the Pencil tool
Position the mouse where you want to begin drawing, now start dragging the mouse, the path created follows the mouse
